com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.itemmanipulation.swipedismiss.undo

Class SimpleSwipeUndoAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.BaseAdapterDecorator
        • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.itemmanipulation.swipedismiss.undo.SwipeUndoAdapter
          • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.itemmanipulation.swipedismiss.undo.SimpleSwipeUndoAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SectionIndexer, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, OnDismissCallback, UndoCallback, com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.util.ListViewWrapperSetter, com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.util.Swappable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TimedUndoAdapter

    public class SimpleSwipeUndoAdapter
extends SwipeUndoAdapter
implements UndoCallback
    An implementation of SwipeUndoAdapter which puts the primary and undo View in a FrameLayout, and handles the undo click event.

        Create a new SimpleSwipeUndoAdapterGen, decorating given BaseAdapter.
        Parameters:
        undoAdapter - the BaseAdapter that is decorated. Must implement UndoAdapter.
        context - the Context.
        dismissCallback - the OnDismissCallback that is notified of dismissed items.

        public void onDismiss(android.view.View view,
             int position)
        Description copied from interface: UndoCallback
        Called when the user has definitively dismissed an item.
        Do NOT remove the item from the adapter here! Instead do this in #onDismiss(android.widget.AbsListView, int[]).
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        view - the parent View, which contains both the primary and the undo Views.
        position - the position of the item that is dismissed.

      • onDismiss

        public void onDismiss(android.view.ViewGroup listView,
             int[] reverseSortedPositions)
        Description copied from interface: OnDismissCallback
        Called when the user has indicated they she would like to dismiss one or more list item positions. When this method is called given positions should be removed from the adapter.
        Specified by:
        onDismiss in interface OnDismissCallback
        Parameters:
        listView - The originating ListView implementation
        reverseSortedPositions - An array of positions to dismiss, sorted in descending order for convenience.
